bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I often build a home in the fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live in colonies.
🐜 I'm small and hard-working.
🍂 You see me a lot when the leaves change color.

bug.question: I fly around flowers and make something sweet. I have a stinger, but I'm usually quite neat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I love colorful plants.
🍯 I make a tasty treat.
🐝 I buzz around.

bug.question: I have beautiful wings with colorful spots. I start as a caterpillar that eats a lot. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through a big change.
🌸 I land on flowers.
🎨 My wings are often very bright.

bug.question: I jump very high and eat green plants. I'm known for my hopping. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat your garden.
🟢 I'm mostly green.
🦵 I have very strong back legs.

bug.question: I light up the night with a little glow. People like to catch me, watch me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I use light to attract mates.
🌃 You see me after dark.
✨ I twinkle.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and like to roam. Some people think I'm lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am often red with black spots.
🟢 I eat aphids on plants.
✨ People like it when I land on them.

bug.question: I can be green or brown, hiding in the trees, mimicking the leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I blend in with the forest.
🌿 I look like the plants around me.
📏 I'm long and thin.

bug.question: I spin a web to catch my prey. I have eight legs and stay hidden away. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I make sticky traps.
🕷️ I'm not technically an insect.
👁️ I have many eyes.

bug.question: I'm a skilled predator and hold my front legs up high. Some say I am praying. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I eat other insects.
🙏 My front legs look like I'm asking.
🟢 I'm usually green, but can be brown.

bug.question: I am a noisy insect, often heard in summer heat. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I only come out in warm weather.
🔊 I make a buzzing sound that can be very loud.
🎶 Males sing to attract females.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves and a colorful head, but I don't have a face. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You might give me as a gift.
☀️ I need sunshine to grow.
💧 I need water to stay healthy.

plant.question: I have a trunk, branches, and leaves, and I'm much taller than you! What am I?

hints.text: 🐦 Birds like to build nests in me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🌳 I can provide shade on a sunny day.

plant.question: I am long and green, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🥗 You can eat me raw in a salad.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me.

plant.question: I have needles instead of leaves, and I stay green all year. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 You might decorate me for Christmas.
🐻 Some bears like to live near me.
🐿️ Squirrels like to hide nuts near my base.

plant.question: I grow underground, and I'm a good source of energy. You can mash me or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I'm a starchy vegetable.
🍟 You can make french fries from me.
🌎 I grow under the ground.

plant.question: I'm a fruit that grows on vines, and I'm often dried into raisins. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I come in green, red and black varieties.
🍷 You can make juice and wine from me.
☀️ I need a lot of sun to grow.

plant.question: I am a vegetable with many layers, that make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have a strong smell.
🍳 You can use me to flavor lots of meals
💧 I am known for making people cry

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated and taste delicious with butter and salt. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 People like to eat me in the cinema.
🌽 I come from corn.
🔥 I need heat to transform me.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant, but I only produce one fruit before I die. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 My fruit looks like a pinecone.
🏝️ I like warm, tropical places.
👑 I am sometimes called the king of fruits.

plant.question: I am a plant with a thick stalk and fluffy white head, often served in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am from the same family as broccoli and cabbage
⚪ I am white, but sometimes come in different colors
🍽️ I am a healthy vegetable to eat.
